name: DreiscSet

infos.name: Set Artikel-Konfigurator
infos.description:
Über den „Set Artikel-Konfigurator“ hast du die Möglichkeit deinen Kunden Artikel Sets anzubieten, die frei konfiguriert werden können.

Hilfe / Dokumentation

Eine ausführliche Dokumentation zu dem Plugin findest du unter:
https://de.dreischild.com/docs/set-product-configurator

Beispiele

Ski-Konfigurator:
https://demo.dreischild.com/Ski-Konfigurator

Müsli-Konfigurator:
https://demo.dreischild.com/Muesli-Konfigurator

Obstkorb:
https://demo.dreischild.com/Obstkorb

Haftungsausschluss: 
Wir entwickeln, testen und supporten unsere Plugins immer gegen den Shopware Standard. D.h., dass die Kompatibilität zu anderen Shopware Plugins, die im gleichen System genutzt werden sollen, durch den Shopbetreiber selbst oder aber durch seine Agentur getestet/sichergestellt werden muss.
infos.installationManual:
Eine ausführliche Dokumentation zu dem Plugin findest du unter:

https://de.dreischild.com/docs/set-product-configurator
infos.shortDescription: Ob Ski Konfigurator, Müsli Bundle oder PC Konfigurator. Über dieses Plugin kannst du bequem und einfach deine Produkt Sets  / Bundles für deine Kunden erstellen.
infos.highlights:
PC-Konfigurator
Ski Konfigurator
Müsli Konfigurator
Eigene Sets 
Eigene Bundles

infos.name: Set Product Configurator
infos.description:
With the "Set article configurator" you have the possibility to offer your customers article sets that can be freely configured.

Help / Documentation

You can find detailed documentation on the plugin at:
https://de.dreischild.com/docs/set-product-configurator

Beispiele

Ski configurator:

https://demo.dreischild.com/en/Ski-Configurator

Muesli configurator:

https://demo.dreischild.com/en/Muesli-Configurator

fruit basket:

https://demo.dreischild.com/en/Fruit-basket/SW10023

Disclaimer:

We always develop, test and support our plugins against the Shopware standard. This means that compatibility with other Shopware plugins that are to be used in the same system must be tested/ensured by the shop operator himself or by his agency.
infos.installationManual:
You can find detailed documentation on the plugin at:
https://de-dreischild-com.translate.goog/docs/set-product-configurator?_x_tr_sl=de&_x_tr_tl=en&_x_tr_hl=de&_x_tr_pto=wapp
infos.shortDescription: Whether ski configurator, muesli bundle or PC configurator. With this plugin you can easily and conveniently create your product sets / bundles for your customers.
infos.highlights:
PC configurator
Ski configurator
Muesli configurator
Own sets
Own bundles

changelog.text: • Cancel cache invalidation on invalid product stream

• Ensure that quantities > 100 can be added to the set shopping cart
  • Fixed cheapest price error in listing

• Ensure that quantities > 100 can be added to the set shopping cart
  • Fixed cheapest price error in listing
• Fixed problems with the scrolling function of the products
• Output of the main product in the position overview
• Variant characteristics in order confirmation mail, item overview and invoice
• Make sure that getCheapestPrice is not NULL (caused an error in certain cases)
• Note output when a variant is no longer available

• If the product detail layout was different, the product images were not displayed
  • Ensure that inactive or sold variants are not displayed in the set selection
  • Zero value check in the store
